RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPER BROTHER was away alertly and dropped back slightly just off the speed, rallied in the stretch four wide, closed determinedly and edged clear late under strong handling. CHARTED dueled on the lead while between horses, gained a clear lead in the stretch, was outfinished late but held place. ONE MORE RING had good position early, rallied three wide in the stretch and closed willingly. AURA OF GOLD dueled on the lead from the inside and weakened in mid stretch. ALL ABOUT CROGE lost left iron leaving gate, recovered and dueled on the lead three wide and tired in mid stretch. GOLDEN CHELLA was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and was no menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Chella
ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and was no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Aura of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead from the inside and weakened in mid stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: One More Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position early, rallied, three wide and closed willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Charted
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead while between horses, gained a clear lead,

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost left iron gate, recovered and dueled,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and dropped back slightly, rallied, in the stret

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMASH was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was well handled on the front end, led throughout and remained well clear while being ridden out. MY REDEMPTION chased the winner throughout, finished willingly and was second best. ENJOY BASEBALL hopped at the start and trailed, had a mild bid in the stretch while no threat. LAUTREC never far back on the inside lacked a late response. DON'T POKE THE CAT contended for three quarters and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: My Redemption
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the winner throughout, finished willingly and was second b

ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back on the inside lacked late response,

ENTRY.COMMENT: contended for three quarters and tired in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped at the start and trailed, had a mild bid in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 8 Allow ed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUSHING BETTY dueled on the lead the entire trip, dug in gamely and prevailed. RED HOT LASS dueled with the winner from the inside, held gamely after a long battle and just missed. RADIANTRITHYM was well placed three wide, finished well and was gaining late. AUJARA never far back, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. CACKI had good position on the inside and gave way. The rider of RED HOT LASS claimed foul against the rider of BLUSHING BETTY for alleged interference at the quarter pole. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

ENTRY.NAME: Cacki
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and had no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled with the winner from the inside, haeld gamely and just mis

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead the entire, dug in gamely and prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 8 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREDIT RIVER was well placed early, rallied on the far turn three wide, closed determinedly and wore down his rivals. WAR NOVEL pressed the early pace, rallied on the far turn and drew even, gained a slight lead in mid stretch, held well and just missed. CINDY'S STORM set the early pace, was hooked at the quarter pole, held stubbornly on the rail through the stretch in a good effort. GOLD HERITAGE was allowed to settle early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. AGNELLO'S DREAM had good position on the inside and went evenly late. GRAND DEAL allowed to settle, failed to menace. BAD LITTLE BEAST was no factor.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was allowed to settle early on the inside, angled out four wide i

ENTRY.COMMENT: was no factor,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the early pace, rallied on the far turn and drew even, he

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAT'S RHYTHM raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch five wide, had a late burst and drew off. NORTHERN JOURNEY was off a step slow, rallied down the backside in the inside, angled out in the stretch causing PROPHETESS to steady, then finished in willingly. BEEBLEGEE was unhurried early, swung seven wide in the stretch and had a late bid. BEST OF YOU was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch and found her best stride late. SWEET EMPIRE raced close up throughout and lacked a late response. NOT A WILD BRAT allowed to settle, failed to menace. PROPHETESS raced close up early, steadied at the top of the stretch when NORTHERN JOURNEY angled out and went evenly late. DIAL AGAIN dueled on the lead and weakened in late stretch. KISSTHECROSS dueled on the lead and tired quickly in mid stretch. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER VIEWING THE TAPE DISQUALIFIED NORTHERN JOURNEY AND PLACED HER SEVENTH FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH WITH PROPHETESS.

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, swung seven wide and had a late bid

ENTRY.COMMENT: was off a step slow, rallied, down the backside in the inside, an

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead and tired in mid stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since December 8 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-2023 Preferred)(Ohio Reg istered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHN'S ROCK had good position early, rallied at the top of the stretch and bore out bumping with STAR HAWK and OUTLIER, drew off late under firm handling. HUNTER SCOTT pressed the early pace and dueled, on the lead, was outfinished late but was second best. OUTLIER tracked four wide throughout, was bumped at the top of the stretch and went evenly late. STAR HAWK was never far back, steadied at the top of the stretch when JOHNS ROCK bore out and had no rally. IRISH UNITY dueled on the lead until mid stretch and faded late.THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER VIEWING THE TAPE DISQUALIFIED JOHNS ROCK AND PLACED HIM FOURTH FOR INTERFERENCE WITH STAR HAWK AND OUTLIER AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 8. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ODIE sprinted out and quickly made the lead, led throughout and remained clear late under strong handling. DARK OAK chased the winner throughout, finished with good courage and held place. HAPPILEA tracked three wide and finished willingly. GOOD ON YA raced mid pack early, swung four wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. FIRST CITIZEN never far back, lacked a late response and went evenly. STAY THIRSTY AMIGO was unhurried early and was no menace late. CUMBER contended early and was through after a half. MAKING ME CRAZY saved ground and was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERLOAD dueled on the lead the entire trip, prevailed by a narrow margin in a game effort. SPLENDID SPIRIT dueled with the winner, held gamely throughout and just missed. RUNAWAY RUSSELL raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch and closed willingly. NOSEY POWER was never far back, on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. GRANDE RED dueled three wide and weakened in the stretch. MUSIC GEM was unhurried early, saved ground, and improved late. MY TICKET contended early and was through after a half. SOL OF VAQUERO was outrun. ALDUIN was no factor.
